attributes.action: Ensure grant funding is awarded instead of loans to Non-League clubs
attributes.additional_details: Due to the losses in income with lack of crowds and sponsorship deals falling through a lot of Non-League teams have struggled to make ends meet, while loans can be appreciated they only delay the significant shortfall in funding that teams have, grant funding is required.
attributes.background: To ensure that Non-League teams who have been dealt a significant loss of income during the pandemic are given grant funding rather than loans in the Sport Winter Survival Package.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, the Government has announced grant funding for non-league clubs as part of the sport winter survival package. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-confirms-10-million-emergency-support-for-steps-3-6-of-the-national-league-system

If you'd like something different, or an increase to what has been announced, you could start a new petition asking for that.
